text: Richard Smith (born July 16, 1980 in Shreveport, Louisiana) is a former professional American football wide receiver. Smith played four games in National Football League with the Kansas City ChiefsRichard Smith Past Stats, Statistics, History, and Awards - databaseFootball.com along with spending time on the practice rosters for the Washington Redskins and the Seattle Seahawks.http://www.nfleurope.com/players/playerpage/1237 Smith played college football at the University of Arkansas and was a long jumper for the Razorback track team. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Shreveport, Louisiana Category:American football wide receivers Category:Arkansas Razorbacks football players Category:Kansas City Chiefs players Category:Canadian football wide receivers Category:Edmonton Eskimos players Category:Arkansas Razorbacks men's track and field athletes
title: Richard Smith (wide receiver)
